alert.note: Alert for Concho; McCulloch; Menard (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 1:12AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern McCulloch, northeastern Menard and southeastern Concho Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 112 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Us-83 Near The Menard- Concho County Line, or near Eden, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brady, Eden, Melvin, Brady Lake, Calf Creek, The Intersection Of Us- 87 And Ranch Road 2134, Us-190 Near The Menard- Mcculloch County Line, The Intersection Of Us- 190 And Ranch Road 1311 and Us-83 Near The Menard- Concho County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
